53 void MPU6050::startup(I2C bus, int fd)
54 {
55  this->bus = bus;
56  this->fd = fd;
57  this->bus.selectDevice(this->fd, MPU6050_ADDR, "MPU6050");
58 
59  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, DIV, 7);
60  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, PWR_M, 1);
61  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, CONFIG, 0);
62  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, GYRO_CONFIG, this->gyroscope_range_configuration);
63  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, ACCEL_CONFIG, this->accelerometer_range_configuration);
64  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, INT_EN, 1);
65 }

67 void MPU6050::get_binary_data()
68 {
69  this->bus.selectDevice(this->fd, MPU6050_ADDR, "QMC5883");
70 
71  float x, y, z;
72 
73  x = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ACCEL_XOUT_L), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ACCEL_XOUT_H));
74  y = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ACCEL_YOUT_L), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ACCEL_YOUT_H));
75  z = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ACCEL_ZOUT_L), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ACCEL_ZOUT_H));
76 
77  Accelerometer::set_3d_magnitude(x, y, z);
78 
79  x = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, GYRO_XOUT_L), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, GYRO_XOUT_H));
80  y = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, GYRO_YOUT_L), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, GYRO_YOUT_H));
81  z = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, GYRO_ZOUT_L), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, GYRO_ZOUT_H));
82 
83  Gyroscope::set_3d_magnitude(x, y, z);
84 }

86 void MPU6050::calibration(int rounds)
87 {
88  float x, y, z;
89 
90  usleep(4000000);
91 
92  float axsum = 0.0f, aysum = 0.0f, azsum = 0.0f;
93  float axoffset = 0.0f, ayoffset = 0.0f, azoffset = 0.0f;
94 
95  std::cout << "Keep accelerometer according to ax = 0 ay = 0 az = 1" << std::endl;
96 
97  for (int i; i < rounds; i++)
98  {
99  MPU6050::get_binary_data();
100  Accelerometer::get_sample();
101  Accelerometer::get_3d_magnitude(x, y, z);
102 
103  std::cout << "ax = " << x << " ay = " << y << " az = " << z << std::endl;
104 
105  axsum += x;
106  aysum += y;
107  azsum += z;
108  usleep(50000);
109  }
110  axoffset = axsum / rounds;
111  ayoffset = aysum / rounds;
112  azoffset = azsum / rounds - 1;
113 
114  std::cout << "axoffset = " << axoffset << " ayoffset = " << ayoffset << " azoffset = " << azoffset << std::endl;
115 
116  usleep(4000000);
117 
118  float gxsum = 0.0f, gysum = 0.0f, gzsum = 0.0f;
119  float gxoffset = 0.0f, gyoffset = 0.0f, gzoffset = 0.0f;
120 
121  std::cout << "Keep gyroscope steady" << std::endl;
122 
123  for (int i; i < rounds; i++)
124  {
125  MPU6050::get_binary_data();
126  Gyroscope::get_sample();
127  Gyroscope::get_3d_magnitude(x, y, z);
128 
129  std::cout << "gx = " << x << " gy = " << y << " gz = " << z << std::endl;
130 
131  gxsum += x;
132  gysum += y;
133  gzsum += z;
134  usleep(50000);
135  }
136  gxoffset = gxsum / rounds;
137  gyoffset = gysum / rounds;
138  gzoffset = gzsum / rounds;
139 
140  std::cout << "axoffset = " << axoffset << " ayoffset = " << ayoffset << " azoffset = " << azoffset << std::endl;
141 
142 }

209  this->mode = CONFIG_CONT;
210  }

216 void QMC5883::startup(I2C bus, int fd)
217 {

219  this->fd = fd;
220 
221  this->bus.selectDevice(this->fd, QMC5883_ADDRESS, "QMC5883");
222 
223  // this->bus.writeRegister(this->fd, REG_CONTROL_1, oversampling | range | rate | mode);
224  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, REG_CONTROL_1, 0x01);
225  // this->bus.writeRegister(this->fd, REG_CONTROL_2, CONFIG2_ROL_PTR);
226  this->bus.i2c_write_register(this->fd, REG_CONTROL_2, 0x50);

237 void QMC5883::get_binary_data()
238 {
239  this->bus.selectDevice(this->fd, QMC5883_ADDRESS, "QMC5883");
240 
241  float x, y, z;
242 
243  x = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, XOUT_LSB), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, XOUT_MSB));
244  y = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, YOUT_LSB), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, YOUT_MSB));
245  z = get_16bit_value(bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ZOUT_LSB), bus.i2c_read_register(fd, ZOUT_MSB));
246 
247  Magnetometer::set_3d_magnitude(x, y, z);

251 bool MS5837_30BA::startup(I2C bus, int fd)
252 {
253 
254  this->fd = fd;
255  bus.selectDevice(fd, MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, "Pressure");
256 
257  int c;
258  int rv;
259  unsigned char data[2] = {0};
260  unsigned char b[2];
261  int result;
262  bus.i2c_write(fd, RESET);
263 
264  usleep(20000);
265 
266  for (u_int8_t i = 0; i < 7; i++)
267  {
268  bus.i2c_write(fd, PROM_READ + 2*i);
269  bus.i2c_read_block(fd, data, 2);
270  c = (data[1] << 8) | data[0];
271 
272  c = ((c & 0xFF) << 8) | (c >> 8);
273  C[i] = c;
274  cout << endl;
275  }
276  int crc = C[0] >> 12;
277  int crcCalculated = _crc4(C);
278  if (crcCalculated != crc)
279  {
280  return false;
281  }
282  return true;
283 }
284 
285 
286 unsigned char MS5837_30BA::_crc4(unsigned int n_prom[])
287 {
288  int cnt;
289  unsigned int n_rem = 0;
290  unsigned char n_bit;
291 
292  n_prom[0] = ((n_prom[0]) & 0x0FFF);
293  n_prom[7] = 0;
294  for (cnt = 0; cnt < 16; cnt++)
295  {
296  if (cnt%2==1) n_rem ^= (unsigned short) ((n_prom[cnt>>1]) & 0x00FF);
297  else n_rem ^= (unsigned short) (n_prom[cnt>>1]>>8);
298  for (n_bit = 8; n_bit > 0; n_bit--)
299  {
300  if (n_rem & (0x8000)) n_rem = (n_rem << 1) ^ 0x3000;
301  else n_rem = (n_rem << 1);
302  }
303  }
304  n_rem = ((n_rem >> 12) & 0x000F);
305  return (n_rem ^ 0x00);
306 }
307 
308 
309 void MS5837_30BA::get_binary_data()
310 {
311 
312  this->bus.selectDevice(this->fd, MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, "Pressure");
313 
314  unsigned long D1 = 0, D2 = 0;
315  int rv;
316  unsigned char pdata[3] = {0}, tdata[3] = {0};
317 
318 
319  bus.i2c_write(fd, CONVERT_D1_OSR8192);
320  usleep(2.5e-6*pow(2, (8+5)) * 1000000);
321 
322  bus.i2c_write(fd, ADC_READ);
323  bus.i2c_read_block(fd, pdata, 3);
324 
325  D1 = pdata[0] << 16 | pdata[1] << 8 | pdata[2];
326 
327  bus.i2c_write(fd, CONVERT_D2_OSR8192);
328 
329  usleep(2.5e-6*pow(2, (8+5)) * 1000000);
330  bus.i2c_write(fd, ADC_READ);
331  bus.i2c_read_block(fd, tdata, 3);
332 
333  D2 = tdata[0] << 16 | tdata[1] << 8 | tdata[2];
334 
335  calculate(D1, D2);
336 }
337 
338 
339 void MS5837_30BA::calculate(unsigned long D1, unsigned long D2)
340 {
341  int32_t dT, temp;
342  int64_t OFF, SENS;
343  int32_t SENSi = 0;
344  int32_t OFFi = 0;
345  int32_t Ti = 0;
346  int64_t OFF2 = 0;
347  int64_t SENS2 = 0;
348 
349  double P, T;
350 
351  dT = D2 - u_int32_t(C[5]) * 256l;
352  SENS = static_cast<int64_t>(C[1]) * 32768l + (static_cast<int64_t>(C[3]) * dT) / 256l;
353  OFF = static_cast<int64_t>(C[2]) * 65536l + (static_cast<int64_t>(C[4]) * dT) / 128l;
354 
355  P = (D1 * SENS / 2097152l - OFF) / 8192l;
356  T = 2000l + int64_t(dT) * C[6] / 8388608LL;
357 
358  if (T / 100. < 20)
359  {
360  Ti = (3 * static_cast<int64_t>(dT) * static_cast<int64_t>(dT)) / 8589934592LL;
361  OFFi = (3 * (T - 2000) * (T - 2000)) / 2;
362  SENSi = (5 * (T - 2000) * (T - 2000)) / 8;
363  if (T / 100. < -15)
364  {
365  OFFi = OFFi + 7. * (T + 1500l) * (T + 1500l);
366  SENSi = SENSi + 4. * (T + 1500l) * (T + 1500l);
367  }
368  }
369  else
370  {
371  Ti = 2 * (dT * dT) / (137438953472LL);
372  OFFi = (1 * (T - 2000l) * (T - 2000l)) / 16;
373  SENSi = 0;
374  }
375  OFF2 = OFF - OFFi;
376  SENS2 = SENS - SENSi;
377 
378  T = static_cast<double>( (T - Ti) / 100 );
379  P = static_cast<double>( (((D1 * SENS2) / (2097152l) - OFF2) / 8192l) / 10.0 );
380 
381  setP(P * conversion);
382  setT(T);
383 
384 }
